bold.description: Use for headers on 'color.elevation.surface' or 'color.elevation.surface.overlay'.

plain.description: Use for body copy and menu items on 'color.elevation.surface' or 'color.elevation.surface.overlay'.

subtle.description: Use for labels and subheadings on 'color.elevation.surface' or 'color.elevation.surface.overlay'.

muted.description: Use for placeholders and hints on 'color.elevation.surface' or 'color.elevation.surface.overlay'.

inverted.description: Use for text on bold backgrounds.

disabled.description: Use for text in a disabled state on 'color.background.disabled.muted' and 'color.background.disabled.subtle'.

selected.description: Use for text in selected states (e.g., tabs or menu items) on 'color.background.selected.subtle'.

brand.description: Use for non-interactive brand-reinforcing text on 'color.elevation.surface' and 'color.elevation.surface.overlay' backgrounds.

plain.description: Use for text that communicates informative messages the user needs to be aware of on neutral backgrounds, such as 'color.elevation.surface' and 'color.elevation.surface.overlay'.

bold.description: Use for text that communicates informative messages the user needs to be aware of on info backgrounds, such as 'color.background.info.subtle' and 'color.background.info.muted'.

plain.description: Use for text that communicates a favorable outcome on neutral backgrounds, such as 'color.elevation.surface' and, 'color.elevation.surface.overlay'

bolder.description: Use for text that communicates a favorable outcome on positive backgrounds, such as 'color.background.positive.subtle', and 'color.background.positive.muted'.

plain.description: Use for text that communicates caution to prevent mistakes or errors on neutral backgrounds, such as 'color.elevation.surface', and 'color.elevation.surface.overlay'.

bold.description: Use for text that communicates caution to prevent mistakes or errors on muted and subtle caution backgrounds, such as 'color.background.caution.subtle', and 'color.background.caution.muted'.

inverted.description: Use for text that communicates caution to prevent mistakes or errors on the bold caution backgrounds 'color.background.caution.bold'.

plain.description: Use for text that communicates negative or serious error states (e.g., validation errors or irreversible actions) on neutral backgrounds, such as 'color.elevation.surface', and 'color.elevation.surface.overlay'.

bold.description: Use for text that communicates negative or serious error states (e.g., validation errors or irreversible actions) on negative backgrounds, such as 'color.background.negative.subtle', and 'color.background.negative.muted'.

plain.description: Use for blue text on neutral backgrounds, such as 'color.elevation.surface' or 'color.elevation.surface.overlay', for purely stylistic purposes with no specific meaning.

bold.description: Use for blue text on muted and subtle blue backgrounds, such as 'color.background.accent.blue.muted' or 'color.background.accent.blue.subtle', when used purely for stylistic purposes without specific meaning.

plain.description: Use for green text on neutral backgrounds, such as 'color.elevation.surface' or 'color.elevation.surface.overlay', for purely stylistic purposes with no specific meaning.

bold.description: Use for green text on muted and subtle green backgrounds, such as 'color.background.accent.green.muted' or 'color.background.accent.green.subtle', when used purely for stylistic purposes without specific meaning.

Use for bold grey text on muted and subtle grey backgrounds, such as 'color.background.accent.grey.muted' or 'color.background.accent.grey.subtle', when used purely for stylistic purposes without specific meaning.

bold.description: Use for yellow text on muted and subtle yellow backgrounds, such as 'color.background.accent.yellow.muted' or 'color.background.accent.yellow.subtle', when used purely for stylistic purposes without specific meaning.

plain.description: Use for red text on neutral backgrounds, such as 'color.elevation.surface' or 'color.elevation.surface.overlay', for purely stylistic purposes with no specific meaning.

bold.description: Use for red text on muted and subtle red backgrounds, such as 'color.background.accent.red.muted' or 'color.background.accent.red.subtle', when used purely for stylistic purposes without specific meaning.

plain.description: Use for links in their default or hovered state. Underline links when hovered. This style is applied on neutral backgrounds, such as 'color.elevation.surface' or 'color.elevation.surface.overlay'.

active.description: Use for links in the active state, applied to neutral backgrounds such as 'color.elevation.surface' or 'color.elevation.surface.overlay'.

visited.description: Use for links in a visited state. This style is applied on neutral backgrounds, such as 'color.elevation.surface' or 'color.elevation.surface.overlay'.

bold.description: Use for icons paired with 'color.text.bold'.

plain.description: Use for icons paired with 'color.text.plain'.

inverted.description: Use for icons on bold backgrounds.

disabled.description: Use for icons in a disabled state paired with 'color.text.disabled'.

selected.description: Use for icons in selected states (e.g., tabs or menu items) paired with 'color.text.selected'.

brand.description: Use for non-interactive brand-reinforcing icons paired with 'color.text.brand'.

primary.description: Use for icons in primary actions paired with a 'color.background.primary.muted' background.

secondary.description: Use for icons in secondary actions paired with a 'color.background.secondary.muted' background.

plain.description: Use to visually group or seperate UI elements, such as card, tabs or side panel dividers.

bold.description: A neutral border option that passes min 3:1 contrast ratios.

inverted.description: Use for borders on bold backgrounds.

disabled.description: Use for borders of elements in a disabled state.

focused.description: Use for focus rings of elements in a focus state.

selected.description: Use for borders that emphasize selected states, such as tabs or menu items.

primary.description: Use for borders that highlight primary actions.

secondary.description: Use for borders that highlight secondary actions.

info.description: Use for borders that highlight informative messages the user needs to be aware of.

positive.description: Use for borders that highlight a favorable outcome.

caution.description: Use for borders that highlight caution to help prevent mistakes or errors.

negative.description: Use for borders that highlight negative or serious error states, such as validation errors or irreversible actions.

disabled.description: Use for backgrounds of elements in disabled state.

idle.description: Use for backgrounds of form UI elements, such as text fields, checkboxes, and radio buttons.

hover.description: Use for backgrounds of form UI elements, such as text fields, checkboxes, and radio buttons in a hovered state.

active.description: Use for backgrounds of form UI elements, such as text fields, checkboxes, and radio buttons in an active state.

idle.description: Use for backgrounds of elements in selected state with subtle emphasis, such as in opened dropdowns.

hover.description: Use for backgrounds of selected elements in hover state state with subtle emphasis, such as in opened dropdowns.

active.description: Use for backgrounds of selected elements in pressed state with subtle emphasis, such as in opened dropdowns.

idle.description: Use for backgrounds of elements in selected state with bold emphasis, such as in opened dropdowns.

hover.description: Use for backgrounds of selected elements in hover state state with bold emphasis, such as in opened dropdowns.

active.description: Use for backgrounds of selected elements in pressed state with bold emphasis, such as in opened dropdowns.

idle.description: Use for the background of primary actions that appear to have no background in idle state. Such as outline and ghost buttons.

hover.description: Use for the background while hovering of primary actions that appear to have no background in idle state. Such as outline and ghost buttons.

active.description: Use for the background while pressing of primary actions that appear to have no background in idle state. such as outline and ghost buttons.

idle.description: Use for the background of primary actions with bold emphasis.

hover.description: Use for the background of primary actions with bold emphasis during hover states.

active.description: Use for the background of primary actions with bold emphasis during pressed states

idle.description: Use for the background of secondary actions that appear to have no background in idle state. Such as outline and ghost buttons.

hover.description: Use for the background while hovering of secondary actions that appear to have no background in idle state. Such as outline and ghost buttons.

active.description: Use for the background while pressing of secondary actions that appear to have no background in idle state. such as outline and ghost buttons.

idle.description: Use for the background of secondary actions with bold emphasis.

hover.description: Use for the background of secondary actions with bold emphasis during hover states.

active.description: Use for the background of secondary actions with bold emphasis during pressed states

idle.description: Use for the background of actions related to informative messages that the user needs to be aware of, which appear to have no background in their idle state, such as outline and ghost buttons.

hover.description: Use for the background while hovering actions related to informative messages that the user needs to be aware of, which appear to have no background in their idle state, such as outline and ghost buttons.

active.description: Use for the background while pressing actions related to informative messages that the user needs to be aware of, which appear to have no background in their idle state, such as outline and ghost buttons.

idle.description: Use for the background of informative messages that the user needs to be aware of.
Use for the background of actions with bold emphasis related to informative messages that the user needs to be aware of.

hover.description: Use as the background for actions with bold emphasis during hover states, related to informative messages that the user needs to be aware of.

active.description: Use as the background for actions with bold emphasis during active states, related to informative messages that the user needs to be aware of.

idle.description: Use for the background of actions related to messages that communicate a favorable outcome, which appear to have no background in their idle state, such as outline and ghost buttons.

hover.description: Use as background while hovering actions related to messages that communicate a favorable outcome, which appear to have no background in their idle state, such as outline and ghost buttons.

active.description: Use as background while pressing actions related to messages that communicate a favorable outcome, which appear to have no background in their idle state, such as outline and ghost buttons.

idle.description: Use for the background of messages that communicate a favorable outcome.
Use for the background of actions with bold emphasis related to messages that communicate a favorable outcome.

hover.description: Use as the background for actions with bold emphasis during hover states, related to messages that communicate a favorable outcome.

active.description: Use as the background for actions with bold emphasis during active states, related to messages that communicate a favorable outcome.
